com.mapdigit.gis.raster
Class RasterMap

java.lang.Object
  com.mapdigit.gis.MapLayer

              com.mapdigit.gis.raster.RasterMap
Direct Known Subclasses:
MapClient, VectorMap
public class RasterMap
extends DigitalMap

RasterMap a map class uses to display raster map.
